mapper.insert: insert into message (id, from_id, to_id, conversation_id, status, create_time, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fromId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{conversationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update message set from_id = #{fromId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, to_id = #{toId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, conversation_id = #{conversationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, from_id, to_id, conversation_id, status, create_time, content from message
